headline: Invitation Homes Announces Voluntary Prepayment of IH 2018-4 Securitization
summary: DALLAS, November 11, 2024--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes" or the "Company") announced today that it has voluntarily prepaid without penalty the outstanding balance of its IH 2018-4 securitization, as planned.
